person.defn: A named person entity must be the name of a person. Only first names, last names, and full names are considered named person entities. Any general reference to a person or people such as "chef", "CEO" and "woman" is not a named entity. A named person entity should not have any starting titles such as "President" or "Mayor".
person.name: person

demos.sentence: local hero saves drowning child from lake.
demos.label: NA

demos.sentence: Mayor Smith unveils new community center in downtown area.
demos.label: WRONG_SPAN

demos.sentence: Local high school student wins national science competition.
demos.label: NA

demos.sentence: Authorities arrest three suspects in connection with bank robbery.
demos.label: NA

location.defn: A named location entity must be the name of a location. Any general reference to a location or locations such as "city hall", "downtown", "major cities" and "bank" is not a named entity. Specific references to a location or locations not assigned a name such as "major airports" and "arts district" are also not named entities. Hurricanes and other natural disasters are not named location entities.
location.name: location

demos.sentence: The Prime Minister of Japan meets with world leaders to discuss economic cooperation.
demos.label: CORRECT

demos.sentence: Local high school marching band to perform at prestigious music festival.
demos.label: NA

demos.sentence: New restaurant to open in downtown area, bringing jobs and economic growth.
demos.label: NA

demos.sentence: Research reveals alarming levels of plastic pollution in the world's oceans, threatening marine life and ecosystems.
demos.label: NA

organization.defn: A named organization entity must be the name of an organization. Any general reference to an organization such as "high school", "city council" and "local community" is not a named entity. Adjectives such as "Chinese" and "European" are also not named organization entities.
organization.name: organization

demos.sentence: local charity organization provides free meals to homeless population during holiday season.
demos.label: NA

demos.sentence: Local non-profit organization provides free meals to homeless veterans.
demos.label: NA

demos.sentence: Researchers discover new exoplanet in habitable zone.
demos.label: NA

demos.sentence: Canadian government announces new immigration policies to attract more international students.
demos.label: NA
